entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Oshawa
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:32 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Oshawa Executive Airport 12:35 PM EST Friday 13 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.6°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 83 %
Wind Chill: -9
Dewpoint: -6.0°C
Wind: NNW 17 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: A few flurries. Temperature steady near minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature steady near minus 3. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Friday 13 January 2023
